package.name: MIMPC++

description.brief: A fast typesafe Mixed Integer MPC C++ library

package.description: The library was originally developed as a fast implementation of an MPC for European Space Agency's [free-floating platform REACSA](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Gunter-Just/publication/374631799_REACSA_Actuated_Floating_Platform_for_Orbital_Robotic_Concept_Testing_and_Control_Software_Development/links/6527d23161c4044c404e6c7d/REACSA-Actuated-Floating-Platform-for-Orbital-Robotic-Concept-Testing-and-Control-Software-Development.pdf) which is controlled by a continuous actuated Reaction Wheel and eight binary actuated thrusters under dwell time constraints. This project contains: 1. The MIMPC __library__ that has been designed to provide a fast MPC for any system that combines continuous and binary actuators under dwell time constraints. 2. A __Simulator__ that provides a simulation based on [Drake toolbox](https://drake.mit.edu/) that simulates the [free-floating platform REACSA](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Gunter-Just/publication/374631799_REACSA_Actuated_Floating_Platform_for_Orbital_Robotic_Concept_Testing_and_Control_Software_Development/links/6527d23161c4044c404e6c7d/REACSA-Actuated-Floating-Platform-for-Orbital-Robotic-Concept-Testing-and-Control-Software-Development.pdf) controlled by the MPC. 3. __Example__ code [(examples/)](../examples/esa_reacsa/main.cpp) that shows how to use the library together with the simulator.
package.author: FranekStark/franek.stark@dfki.de
